transcript:
[Ringing]
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes, hello.
Executive: Hello. Hi, good morning sir, main Humaira baat kar rahi hu. Industrial banker se number se connect kiya tha sir maine aapko. Last time apan discussion kar rahe the sir Friday ko par baat ho nahi paayi. Sudip sir aap se. Main ye chahti hu by lease aur services ke bare mein bhi jaise ki aap India mart vagera hai.
Customer: Thoda jayega meeting mein hai baad mein baat karte hai.
Executive: Aap kab tak free ho jayenge mujhe bata de main tab aapko connect kar lungi.
Customer: 4 baje free hai.
Executive: 4 baje? Meeting ka link bhej ke rakh deti hu aapko. To hum connect kar lenge aur main cheeze aapko clear bhi kar dungi jo bhi hai India mart related. Thik hai sir, okay.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about lease and services like IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive will send a meeting link and connect to clarify things related to IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will connect at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

lease, services, indiamart, meeting
